name: Gorgeous Gemma in Escape from the Space Disposal Planet
overview: Game presented in the MSXdev'14 contest. The Mingamoniato is the most powerful energy on the whole universe. Eurasia Drilling Corp. is a mega corporation who hunts planets to extract this mineral, but also, destroy and dry all life in it. Help Gorgeous Gemma as a former member of C.L.E.A.N. to purge the planet Illud from thrashy radiation capsules, pushing them to an armored container.
